lead_paragraph: Readers cite a yearning for “old England,” a desire for self-determination, anti-immigrant views and insulting rhetoric toward the Leave camp.

headline.main: Reasons Behind the British Vote to Leave the E.U.
headline.print_headline: Behind the British Vote to Leave

snippet: Readers cite a yearning for “old England,” a desire for self-determination, anti-immigrant views and insulting rhetoric toward the Leave camp.
